entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 03:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: SSW 59 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then south 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High 8 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to freezing rain or rain near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northeast 20 near noon. High 8 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain in the evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
